metadata.title: CVE-2015-8717 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The dissect_sdp function in epan/dissectors/packet-sdp.c in the SDPdissector in Wireshark 1.12.x before 1.12.9 does not prevent use of anegative media count, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8717` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwireshark6 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwiretap5 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwsutil6 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
tshark - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-common - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-gtk - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-qt - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.2+ga16e22e-1').
